title: Portfolio
aboutText: Computer engineering student and full-stack developer

projects.title: Recess Chess
projects.description: A multiplayer game a team of 6 students, including myself, created at the second semester of our bachelors degree. This was my first meeting with the combination of JavaFX and communication between JavaDB and a database using MySQL.

projects.title: Miniproject in system development 2 at NTNU
projects.description: Our task was to create an online newspaper with React, in which we had two applications - one for the client site and one for the server.

projects.title: Harmoni
projects.description: A larger project where we used scrum to organize our team during development. We were a team consisting of 9 people which was supposed to create an application, with the purpose of making the information-flow better for the firm planning events.

projects.title: Website for IN Entreprenør AS - under development
projects.description: The firm wanted me to create a new website for them. They wanted a simple, yet modern website which gave their customers the possibility to read about what the firm has to offer. It is still under development as I have to collect some text and information in which they will hand me in the near future.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio was created for showing which projects I have worked on in the past.
